abstract: A big rush to buy computer servers means there may not be time for a new model of server, using non-Intel chips, to reach broad acceptance.
snippet: A big rush to buy computer servers means there may not be time for a new model of server, using non-Intel chips, to reach broad acceptance.
lead_paragraph: Intel has a message for its doubters: Time, in terms of a rush to build more big computing centers, is on its side.

headline.main: Rising Demand May Save Intel From Low-Price Competitors
